title: MrCryptHodl
author: MrCryptHodl
created_time: December 11, 2023, 10:39:28 PMLast edit: March 19, 2024, 11:33:21 PM by MrCryptHodl
content: MOON PHASES COLLECTION : FULL AND NEW MOONWelcome everyone to the Official MOON PHASES COLLECTION : FULL AND NEW MOON 2-coins set sale !And yes, itâ€™s now been 3 months since the last 1hodlclub sale! The production for this piece was especially complicated, but now we are there!After a long process of creation and manufacturing, the 1HoDLCLUB is happy to present its new slabs to you,pecially designed for this collection, it measures 3â€³ x 2â€³ x 0.3â€³ and is entirely made of stainless steel !it adds a new dimension to the 1HODLCLUB collectibles! Inside, protected by two windows, it contains the famous coins from the MOON PHASES collection.Here you will find the FULL and NEW MOON version, with a weight of 1/2 Troy Ounce and a diameter of 32mm, its front side was designed directly from a photo of the full moon taken by me and my fathers , to then be vectorized and adapted to the creation of a mold for the coins.At the back you will find the latest 1HoDLCLUB security hologram, with a mini QRcode which gives you direct access to your public address and which protects the private key located underneath. In addition, the serial numbers of the coins are directly laser engraved on the back of the coin itself as well.This is a set of two coins with matching serial numbers, each piece has its own slabs with laser engraved serial numbers on the back of it. There are only 21 sets of two coins, so there are only 21 coins of each Moon Phases.Once again a big thank you to everyone for your support and trust! Itâ€™s thanks to everyoneâ€™s support that all this is possible! 2023 wasn't easy but 2024 promises to be great!Thank you all again and I wish you all a wonderful day/evening!2-Coins set available : 21 SOLD / 0 AVAILABLEFULL MOON COINMintage : 21Material : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 32mmThickness : 2.8mmWeight : 1/2 Troy OunceDenomination : 0.0021 Â BTCSerial : 1 to 21NEW MOON COINMintage : 21Material : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 32mmThickness : 2.8mmWeight : 1/2 Troy OunceDenomination : 0.0021 Â BTCSerial : 1 to 21The price is 565$ per 2-coins set + shipping costLoading is not included in the price, payment for the loading must be made separatly after receipt of the package and loading will be done at that time.Shipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide:1 - 2 sets : 26$Europe:1 - 2 sets - 22$Payment Adress :BTC : bc1qugkr6sl7jd8v2wj6mkf56hazx3mvyh8vtdnhr9 Shipping start at Tuesday 12.12.23 !After payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Coins / ShippingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference list:Code:BTC  : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL1HoDLCLUB Store : https://1hodlclub.com
